name: Hurtz
description:
TLDR;

A love letter to roguelikes and rhythm games; Hurtz is a roguelike (lite?) with procedurally generated music that you wield as a weapon to vanquish foes.

Keep sound on for best experience

CONTROLS
VIKEYS (hjkl) or Arrow Keys for movement.

Press Q/q to inspect different items and creatures.

Press period (.) to cancel movement.

DETAILED BACKGROUND

 "wizard guy casting spells to a beat"

Hurtz's gameplay is pretty straightforward; you move a wizard character across various levels of a dungeon while he casts spells to music. You can increase the power of the spells through various enchantments you get after finishing each level. These enchantments come in many forms, ranging from increasing the power of your spells to changing notes themselves.
